title: RADS Error - Could not connect to the HTTP server.
body:
When im reintall my games. Game doesnt work !!! I dont know why :( 
Network properties doesnt works  because i have manual settings DNS. Can not connect via DNS 8.8.8.8. / 8.8.4.4... 
It connects my computer to the Internet.

Please Help me..

replies.body: This might be caused by a security config that's not allowing the game to launch properly.  Instead, try out the steps in our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure League is being added as an exception.  You can also use our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to auto-configure your firewall settings just to be extra sure.  I hope that helps!
